title: Classic
review: This is one of the greatest films I've ever have seen.  I think that this should have gotten best picture.

title: disturbing
review: This film was disturbing. This is not the way a good ghost should act! (even if there were no ghost).  Well the best part is the song.

title: Funny
review: This is a clever film.  I think this is a funny film.  It's way better then Toy Story, even though I did like Toy Story.

title: A cool movie
review: This is one of the coolest movies I've seen!  I love this film.  This is also one of the most clever films I have seen, this is great.

title: Great
review: Even though I'm only 16 I think this is one of the greatest films of all time.  I think this is a very good film.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
title: One of the best films
review: This film is very great.  It's one of the few films I would give a ten. There isn't anything like it.

movie_title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
title: Best of the series
review: This is the best Indy film.  I think that this is a very very good movie.  I give this 5 out of 5.

title: Possibly the greatest film of all time
review: This is a good movie.  This has good special effects.  To put it simple this is probably the best movie ever.
